name: Virus Control (cpiteam)
description:
Organism is fighting against desease, take a side and conquire the battle! Play as a threatening virus, contaminating everyhting it touches, or play as a mighty immunity, sending antibody troops to the frontline of the war for their homeland.

How to play

Units generated and move automatically, control units production to affect game flow and watch the battle!

Your forces are trying to reach other side to hit the core, wish them good luck!

Units are rock-paper-scissors: each beats some and is beaten by some, so your choice is crucial for the game result!

Features

  • play vs bot - choose difficulty to push it hard, but not too hard
  • play vs friend - start private game and pass join code to another player, let's see who is the best!
  • play vs random player - choose this option and system will find a player like you to play with. With internet, you're always in a good company!
  • watch bots fight - tired of doing stuff? Just relax and watch the show and don't forget to cheer!
  • nice music and visuals - watch for the battles, with pleasure!

And more to come! Rate app, write your feedback and share the game to help me making updates, thank you!
